Function Sonification

Transform mathematical functions into musical sequences. Watch as your equations come alive through sound and visualization.

Use x as the variable. Supported: sin, cos, tan, sqrt, abs, ^, +, -, *, /

Playback Controls

120

How it works

  • → X-axis maps to time (88 points = 88 piano keys)
  • → Y-axis maps to pitch (higher values = higher notes)
  • → Steeper slopes = faster tempo
